title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Adaptive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and fundamental laboratory manipulation skills
context.additional_context: Customized science education program tailored to individual learners' progress and comprehension levels in a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can select and utilize science content optimized for their individual learning styles through an adaptive system.
Learners can achieve scientific problem-solving skills with over 80% accuracy through project-based assessments.
Learners can identify personal areas of weakness and develop improvement plans based on learning data analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
